mapper.select: SELECT b.id FROM suncent_level_base b INNER JOIN suncent_level_core c ON b.core_id = c.id INNER JOIN suncent_level_dept d ON b.dept_id = d.id WHERE c.core_name = #{core} AND d.dept_name = #{dept}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO suncent_users ( user_id, user_role, user_account, user_pwd, user_name, user_name_en, phone, email, level_id, title, intro, ctime, mtime )VALUES( #{userId},#{roleId},#{account},#{pwd},#{name},#{nameEn},#{phone},#{email},#{level}, #{title},#{intro},sysdate(),'' )

INSERT INTO suncent_users ( user_id, user_role, user_account, user_pwd, user_name, user_name_en, phone, email, level_id, title, intro, ctime, mtime )VALUES
( #{user.userId},#{user.roleId},#{user.account},#{user.pwd},#{user.name},#{user.nameEn},#{user.phone}, #{user.email},#{user.level},#{user.title},#{user.intro},sysdate(),'' )
mapper.sql: SELECT user_id as userId, user_role as roleId, user_account as account, user_pwd as pwd, user_name as name, user_name_en as nameEn, phone as phone, email as email, level_id as level, title as title, intro as intro, ctime as ctime, mtime as mtime FROM suncent_users
